```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(quantmod)
library(tseries)
```


```{r, warning=FALSE}
set.seed(123)

getSymbols("SPY", src="yahoo", from="2022-05-14", to="2022-11-14")
names(SPY)
plot(Cl(SPY), main="SPY Price")

prices <- Cl(SPY)
head(prices)
tail(prices)

logret <- periodReturn(prices, period="daily", type="log")
plot(logret, main="SPY Daily Log Returns")

qqnorm(logret, main="Q-Q plot of the log-returns")

jarque.bera.test(logret)
```
